00020 abstract class Galleria_Model_Collection extends Galleria_Model
00021 {

00033     public function getSearchPictures($text, $pg, $year)
00034     {
00035         if (empty($text) && empty($pg) && empty($year))
00036             return array();
00037 
00038         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00039         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->hasGroups()) {
00040             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.desc FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE ( pd.gid IS NULL OR pd.gid IN (' . $this->_prepareIn(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()) . ') ) AND pd.pg ILIKE ? AND pd.year LIKE ? AND (pd.desc ILIKE ? OR pd.pid IN (SELECT pt.pictureid FROM galleria.picturetags AS pt JOIN galleria.tags AS t ON t.id = pt.tagid WHERE t.name ILIKE ?)) AND pd.shown = TRUE');
00041             $sth->execute(array_merge(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups(), array('%' . $pg . '%', '%' . $year . '%', '%' . $text . '%', '%' . $text . '%')));
00042         } else {
00043             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.desc FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.gid IS NULL AND pd.pg ILIKE ? AND pd.year LIKE ? AND (pd.desc ILIKE ? OR pd.pid IN (SELECT pt.pictureid FROM galleria.picturetags AS pt JOIN galleria.tags AS t ON t.id = pt.tagid WHERE t.name ILIKE ?)) AND pd.shown = TRUE');
00044             $sth->execute(array('%' . $pg . '%', '%' . $year . '%', '%' . $text . '%', '%' . $text . '%'));
00045         }
00046         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00047     }

00056     public function getCats()
00057     {
00058         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00059         $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT c.id, c.name, c.parent FROM galleria.categories AS c');
00060         $sth->execute();
00061         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00062     }

00071     public function getGroups()
00072     {
00073         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00074         $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT g.id, g.name, g.admin FROM galleria.groups AS g');
00075         $sth->execute();
00076         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00077     }

00086     public function getTags()
00087     {
00088         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00089         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->hasGroups()) {
00090             if (Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup()) {
00091                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT * FROM galleria.tagdata');
00092                 $sth->execute();
00093             } else {
00094                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT td.* FROM galleria.tagdata AS td JOIN galleria.tagsofpictures AS top ON td.tid = top.tid JOIN galleria.picturedata AS pd ON top.pid = pd.pid WHERE (pd.gid IS NULL OR pd.gid IN ('. $this->_prepareIn(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()) .')) AND pd.shown = TRUE');
00095                 $sth->execute(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups());
00096             }
00097         } else {
00098             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT td.* FROM galleria.tagdata AS td JOIN galleria.tagsofpictures AS top ON td.tid = top.tid JOIN galleria.picturedata AS pd ON top.pid = pd.pid WHERE pd.gid IS NULL AND pd.shown = TRUE');
00099             $sth->execute();
00100         }
00101         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00102     }

00114     protected function _addChangelog($uid, $pid, $action)
00115     {
00116         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00117         $sth = $pdo->prepare('INSERT INTO galleria.picturemodifies (pictureid, userid, action) VALUES (?, ?, ?)');
00118         return $sth->execute(array($pid, $uid, $action));
00119     }
